resources.string: "Ova značajka šifrira i šalje ID vašeg uređaja na Avast poslužitelje (%s)."
Ovo je adware. On automatski donosi reklame.
Ovo je Crypter virus. To je zlonamjerni softver koji se prenosi repliciranjem samog sebe u prostor za pohranu.
Ovo je Dropper virus. Nosi kôd koji instalira drugi zlonamjerni virus.
The virus is an exploit. It takes advantage of a bug or vulnerability in system in order to cause unintended or unanticipated behavior.
The infection is inferred by using a specific heuristic. A specific heuristic analysis says that it is a virus.
The virus is a joke. It creates some annoying or humorous effect as a joke. It normally has less damage on the system.
The virus is a potentially unwanted program (PUP). It is a program that may be unwanted (like spyware, adware, etc), despite the possibility that users give consen to download it.

The virus is a rootkit. It is a type of software designed to hide the fact that an operating system has been compromised. It is used to gain control over the device by hiding deep inside the system. Rootkits allow viruses and malware to “hide in plain sight” by disguising as necessary files that normal antivirus software will overlook.
"The virus is a spyware. It a software that covertly gathers user information through the user' Internet connection without his or her knowledge."
A common suspicious type. The antivirus system is trying to classify it.
The virus is a potentially evil tool infecting by means similar to PUP.

The virus is a trojan. It is a a malware designed to provide unauthorized, remote access to a user’s device. Trojans normally do not have the ability to replicate themselves like viruses; however, they can lead to other malware being installed on a machine, various data being stolen, or other malicious activities.

The virus is a worm. It is a standalone malware that replicates itself in order to spread to other devices. Takes advantage of file or information transport features of system (such like network), it can travel without any human action. Worms almost always cause at least some harm to the network.
"Ova značajka šifrira i šalje ID vašeg uređaja na AVL poslužitelje (%s)."
Pošalji imena i detalje aplikacija i skenirajte pomoću online definicije virusa.
"Ova značajka šifrira i šalje ID vašeg uređaja na Tencent poslužitelje (%s)."
